attributes.action: apologise to former defence chiefs General Lord Guthrie and Admiral Lord Boyce for describing their criticism of him as “wrong” and “inappropriate” in the defence funding row.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the highly respected senior officers stated, the PM himself has now admitted he shouldn’t have told the Chilcot Inquiry and the House of Commons that Labour increased defence spending in real terms every year, when it actually decreased during for four years.
